name: BetweentheFiniteandtheInfinite
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you think there are colors in a rainbow? “The spectrum is continuous, with no clear boundaries between one color and the next.“ We humans, living at the interface between the finite and the infinite, see the beauty of the rainbow but still we want to give each color a name. Dr. Ramsay has had 89 years to think about the oxymorons we face in life and now is turning his book, The Answer is a Question, into a weekly series of podcasts. They can be used as a weekly guide to how to live at the interface. How you understand life makes a big difference in how you use it as an incredible gift!

This skill was designed, developed, and is hosted by Witlingo. If you would like your very own flash briefing, send an email to contact@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
